[Label] about description: Provide a brief summary of your company’s mission, key services, and expertise in the mobility sector. Focus on what sets you apart and how you contribute to ENVITED-X. Max 500 characters.
[Description] select new logo: Upload your company logo in PNG, JPG, GIF, or SVG format. Max file size: 10 MB. For best results, use a high-resolution image with a transparent background (for PNG or SVG) and a minimum size of 300x300 pixels.
[Description] business categories: Select all the categories that best describe your business’s role in the ecosystem. You can choose multiple categories.
[Description] offering name: Enter the name of the service or product related to ENVITED-X. Max. 100 characters.
[Description] offering type: Describe the type of offering in max. 100 characters. Use semicolons to separate multiple entries; each will be displayed in a new tag.
[Description] offering functionalities: Detail the key functionalities of this offering in max. 500 characters. Focus on the core features that support simulation, AI, or mobility solutions.
[Description] offering supported tools: List the tools your offering supports in max. 150 characters. Use semicolons to separate multiple tools; each will be displayed in a new tag.
[Description] offering supported standar: List the standards your offering adheres in max. 150 characters. Use semicolons to separate multiple standards; each will be displayed in a new tag.
[Description] website: Enter your company’s official website URL. Ensure it starts with http:// or https:// for proper linking.
[Notification] welcome message: Welcome to ENVITED-X, please fill in your profile to publish it
